item.title: Hugo Shortcodes Reference for ScopeCam Documentation
item.description: Hugo Shortcodes Reference for ScopeCam Documentation ðŸŸ¢ Active Overview This document provides a reference guide for the custom Hugo shortcodes available in the ScopeCam MCP documentation site. Shortcodes allow for consistent application of special formatting and components across the documentation. What Are Shortcodes? Shortcodes are special Hugo constructs that provide a simple way to extend Markdown’s capabilities. They allow for inserting complex content or formatting without resorting to HTML, ensuring consistency across the documentation.
